item.title: Is Broadband the Next Oil?
item.description:
Customers are enraged by the escalating prices of gasoline and heating oil. The cost of oil seems to be limitless, as traders frantically outbid each other for future contracts. It feels like a never-ending cycle of increasing prices. And now, prepare yourself: the next crisis might involve broadband internet. You might be wondering how broadband, especially internet broadband, could resemble oil. Oil is a natural resource with over a century of extraction history, while broadband is a relatively recent technological invention...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/is-broadband-the-next-oil/
